vsParam:
Huh? I didn't expect to see Ru Sensei here.
It seems he has something on his mind...
Ru Sensei, what are you doing here?

Oh, it's you. I've been investigating on the monster
that haunts "Woofer Village".

Let me see... It's a silver "Puni Puni?" that haunts
the neighborhood... Right?

No... It does look like a silver Puni Puni,
but it is not.

The "Puni Puni?" around here is known to
be timid and inactive...

But this monster around Woofer Village is very aggressive.
We got lots of reports about villagers attacked by it.

Lord Rose Hip of Ribrum went to investigate and
he got attacked too.

Thank god we repelled the monsters successfully...
Anyway, I want to investigate in person.

Eh, you're going there by yourself?
What if you're attacked by this monster?

What are you talking about? Who do you think I am?!
I'm so much better at combatting than you.

I've looked through all the reports on this monster.
And I remember every single trait of the monsters that I defeated.

Sorel, Ru Sensei is right. He does look like a kid,
but it's rude for you to make such a joke!
Wait... Wait, I didn't mean that...

Never mind...
End of converstaion. I'm going to investigate.

Ah, let us give you a hand!
We'll help Woofer Village to get rid of the trouble too!

Oh, thank you. But it's said this monster is very
persevering just like "Puni Puni?". Don't underrate it.

Got it.
[px], let's hurry to Woofer Village now!
